page.title: 05HOUSING _ TYPE AND AMOUNT
page.content:
Housing - Type and amount.
In all the three villages there is a mixture of old and new housing. In our survey we found terraced housing, - old and new - semi detached houses and bungalows and detached houses and bungalows. We found that more than half the housing was new. Most of the new housing in Withernwick were bungalows and most of the old housing were terraced cottages . One house in Withernwick called Katys Nook has got deeds going back to 1797 and they were not the first deeds of the house. One farm house was built in 1814. While doing our survey we noticed in Withernwick that some of the older houses had had extensions built on to them.
